name: Skyscraper Stack Builder
description:
It's time to raise the stakes... and a tower, we suppose!

Time your taps to raise the highest of high-rises in this amazing building simulator.

Compete against your firiends to see who's the best of the bunch on the high-score leaderboard!

Are you ready to build the tallest tower? Install now to enjoy this amazing arcade game brought to you by Tap Tap Games by Huuuge!
